title: Letters: We are all pro-life. Republicans are in reverse gear.
description: Letters to the Editor: What out for the MAGA muscle car. Would you want to be born to someone who does not want you?
text_headers:
Letters: 'With an exterior painted a garish color,' MAGA muscle car blew hot air on Ohio
'MAGA muscles' flexed during the primary or did they?  
"We are all pro-life"
text: Letters: We are all pro-life. Republicans are in reverse gear.News Sports Entertainment Business Opinion Advertise Obituaries eNewspaper Legals  LETTERSLetters: 'With an exterior painted a garish color,' MAGA muscle car blew hot air on OhioLetters to the Editor'MAGA muscles' flexed during the primary or did they?  There’s a reason voting in Ohio made headlines nationwide.May 3 was a spring day when Republicans in Ohio slid the tarp off the MAGA muscle car they had stored in the garage and took it for a spin. The one with fenders flaring out on both sides. More:J.D. Vance’s 'disdain' for Ukraine proof he's wrong for Ohioans and Donald Trump| OpinionWith twin exhausts blowing hot air that pollutes the environment we live in.A car still loud from the roar of its engine with lots of cubic inches. Not to mention screeching tires when going from 0-60 in single digits.With an exterior painted a garish color and an interior featuring an electroluminescent steering wheel. Shiny objects providing bragging rights.Even though the Republicans were in reverse gear and going backwards. Even though a lot of expensive gas got consumed. MAGA muscle, after all, means power. To get Republicans where they want to go.More:Ohio Governor race: Mike DeWine to face former Dayton mayor Nan Whaley in NovemberOld Glory flew from Republicans’ outstretched A-pillar mounted antennas.Freedom provided the wind in their sails.  John E. Reinier Sr., ColumbusMore:How to submit a letter to the editor for The Columbus Dispatch"We are all pro-life"Every abortion — biologically spontaneous, elective, or medically— advised is intended to protect innocents from suffering.Every single one.Why else would abortions ever be performed?We decide to abort only when we know that going Home to the Divine to await another chance will be much better for our child than being born into circumstances of hunger, abuse, addiction, poverty, extreme physical challenge, or unwantedness and neglect.More:Crassness, Trump's antic would be worth if Supreme Court overturns abortion| OpinionIt’s the Golden Rule, really.We wouldn't want to be born to someone who can't care for us, can’t protect us, or doesn't want us, would we?So why in the world would we wish that on someone else, let alone legislate it on to a baby?We are a loving, physical, sexual species, and sometimes unwanted conceptions occur.We can also be a violent, domineering, unthinking species, and again, unwanted conceptions occur. But a conception does not create a baby. It creates only a body.It does not create a life, because life pre-exists and post-exists all earthly bodies. (And if your spirituality doesn’t include this statement, then why do you care about abortion anyway?)More:Letters: I remember 'horror stories of girls who died in desperate circumstances' before RoeWe are all pro-life.
